snippet.title: Indian Game on Indian Maratha History | Tanhaji - The Lion Maratha Warrior | Tanhaji Game Promo
snippet.description:
The empire formally existed from 1674 with the coronation of Shivaji as the Chhatrapati and ended in 1818 with the defeat of Peshwa Bajirao II at the hands of the British East India Company. The Marathas are credited to a large extent for ending Mughal Rule over most of the Indian subcontinent.
Chattrapati Shivaji Maharaj was the founder of Hindavi Swarajya.
Many Maratha soldier has given their life to build the Maratha Empire and Tanhaji was one of them.
Tanhaji  - The Lion Maratha Warrior is developed on the history of Tanhaji Malusare.
Tanhaji  - The Lion Maratha Warrior is India's first 3d Story Based strategy war Game(" Indian Game 😍😍 ") on Maratha History. In the game, you become the Tanhaji and your task is the win the fort of Kondhana for your king - The Great Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj! Maharashtra is a place of great Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj and Sambhaji Maharaj. Marathas were keenly known for their valour and devoutness towards their king Shivaji Maharaj. 

Game Play -
This is the first RPG - Role Playing Game on Maratha Warrior and Maharashtrian Culture. This game is all about winning the fort Kondhana back. In this game, you become the Tanaji the Lion Warrier. Try winning the Great fort use your sword to kill enemy soldiers. Fight a bloody war against the Mughal subedar Udaybhan and his right hand - Siddhi Hilal.

Levels -
There are 12 Levels of the game and in each level, as the Character hero Tanaji achieves a new height of bravery Game would award a new Rank to his Name. In this way, he would start from Rank Mawala to raise through Sarnaubat. These were the real Ranks in Maratha Infantry during the Era of The Great Shivaji Maharaj.

BE THE MARD MAVALE !!!! 
If you like, Subscribe to our channel and share the link among your friends

Best Action Game
Best Indian Game
Best War Game
Best RPG Game

Play Store Link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.AbracaDabra.Tanhaji&showAllReviews=true

Game Download Link For Steam :  
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1732270/Tanhaji__The_Lion_Maratha_Warrior_of_Ch_Shivaji/

Discord Link:
https://discord.gg/jEnuKYpd

Tanhaji-The Lion Maratha Warrior website :
https://tanhaji.in/
